dcterms:creator: Mariana-Iuliana Georgescu
Radu Tudor Ionescu
Nicolae Verga
dcterms:description: The IXI dataset contains 3D multimodal MRI scans, where each MRI has three modalities: T1-weighted, T2-weighted, and Proton Density. It is split into 500 multimodal MRI scans for training, 6 for validation, and 70 for testing, with each scan having 96 slices of resolution 240 × 240 pixels.
dcterms:title: IXI

dcterms:creator: Mariana-Iuliana Georgescu
Radu Tudor Ionescu
Nicolae Verga
dcterms:description: The NAMIC Brain Multimodality dataset consists of 20 3D MRI scans, each formed of 176 slices with a resolution of 256 × 256 pixels. It contains two modalities: T1-weighted and T2-weighted, and is split into 10 scans for training and 10 for testing.
dcterms:title: NAMIC Brain Multimodality

dcterms:creator: Nicolae-Catalin Ristea
Andreea-Iuliana Miron
Olivian Savencu
Mariana-Iuliana Georgescu
Nicolae Verga
Fahad Shahbaz Khan
Radu Tudor Ionescu
dcterms:description: The Coltea-Lung-CT-100W dataset contains 100 triphasic lung CT scans, each with three modalities: native, arterial, and venous. The dataset consists of 12,430 triphasic slices, each with a resolution of 512 × 512 pixels, and is split into 70 scans for training, 15 for validation, and 15 for testing.
dcterms:title: Coltea-Lung-CT-100W
